Respec a Character in Baldur's Gate 3

In Baldur's Gate 3, you can Respec your characters as many times as you want, as long as they have the required gold and have already added Withers to the Camp. Approach to him and select Respec among the services he provides. Withers will ask for 100 gold pieces for his service.
